Examples:
for binary cyclic code (21,16): n=21, k=16, r=5;
g(x)=61 » 110 001 » x^5+x^4+1
for BCH code (7,4): n=7, k=4, r=3;
g(x)=13 » 1 011 » X^3+x+1 

----------------------------------------------------
      	n     	k     	r     	d    	g(x)
----------------------------------------------------
      	7     	4	3	3	13
	    	3	4	4	35
     	15    	11	4	3	23
